en: You hunker down as the battle rages. I'm sorry, Sasha. I'm [color=STEEL_BLUE]not as brave as you[/color].
"The [color=CRIMSON]terrorist attack[/color] has been repelled! The ringleaders are being [color=DARK_VIOLET]processed[/color] as we speak."
Chief Yukon drags in resistance members in chains, Sasha among them. "These [color=CRIMSON]traitors[/color] will face [color=DARK_VIOLET]final processing[/color]."
Sasha catches your eye. Despite her bruises, her gaze holds [wave amp=15 freq=2][color=CHARTREUSE]no judgment, only sadness[/color][/wave].
You've survived by keeping your head down, but [pulse freq=3][color=GOLD]at what cost?[/color][/pulse] As [color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color] production wafts from the plant, your stomach turns.
Perhaps there's still a chance from the inside. Or maybe you're just easing your conscience.
You [tornado radius=3 freq=2][color=CHARTREUSE]abandon your post[/color][/tornado] and race toward the fighting. The time for caution is over.
[pulse freq=3][color=GOLD]Prove you're with us![/color][/pulse] How do you know Sasha?
[color=CHARTREUSE]The roots grow deep![/color] I'm from the checkpoint, Sasha recruited me!
They're taking her to the processing plant right now. We need to hurry!
The doors blast open, revealing the [wave amp=25 freq=3][color=CRIMSON]horrific truth[/color][/wave] - grinding machines, conveyors carrying potatoes to their doom.
At the end of one belt - Sasha and others [color=CRIMSON]bound helplessly[/color]. Supervisor Russet stands at the controls.
[color=RED]YOU![/color] I should have known you were one of them! Back away or I start the processor!
As resistance fighters overpower Russet, Sasha redirects the facility cameras. [color=YELLOW]People of Spud! This is Root Reserve! They've been feeding us to each other![/color]
You came back for me. [color=CHARTREUSE]We did it. The truth is out there now.[/color] We have a future to build!
